current.title: Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel
current.description: Hordes of Hel is a gripping roguelike horde-survivor game set in the dark realms of Norse Mythology. Fight waves of enemies to earn divine blessings of ancient Norse Gods, explore hostile worlds and face powerful bosses. Become a god-like warrior in this ultimate showdown.

steam_games.title: 100% Orange Juice
steam_games.description: 100% Orange Juice is a digital multiplayer board game populated by developer Orange Juice's all-star cast. Characters from Flying Red Barrel, QP Shooting, Suguri and Sora come together with all-new characters to duke it out... with dice.
steam_games.all_reviews: 94% of the 8,612 user reviews in your language are positive

steam_games.title: Toy Tinker Simulator
steam_games.description: Have you ever wanted to be a toy tinker? This is a unique chance to become one! Repair toys and start your toy-museums to make everyone happy!
steam_games.all_reviews: 58% of the 266 user reviews for this game are positive.

steam_games.title: Rat Quest
steam_games.description: In this platformer, jumping will be your main mechanic as you climb the level, each jump matters, if you miss a jump, you have to restart. You may be small but so are the platforms.
steam_games.all_reviews: 100% of the 11 user reviews for this game are positive.
